structure.unit: Withholding Of Taxes On Wages And Declarationof Estimated Income Tax

law.text: If the remuneration paid by an employer to an employee for services performed during one half or more of any pay-roll period of not more than thirty-one consecutive days constitute wages, all the remuneration paid by such employer to such employee for such period shall be deemed to be wages; but if the remuneration paid by an employer to an employee for services performed during more than one half of any such pay-roll period does not constitute wages, then none of the remuneration paid by such employer to such employee for such period shall be deemed to be wages.
